Articles.Content: Since upgrading to 1.2.2, I have had a problem with parts not showing up in the VAB. I am playing in career mode and have set so that new parts require an initial purchase. Anything that hasn't had that initial purchase just doesn't show up at all now, so I have no way to purchase things. Specifically I have noticed this on some solar panels. I have unlocked the SP-W 3x2 Photovoltaic Panels, and those show up, but the SP-L 1x6 Photovoltaic Panels are no where to be seen.
